title: Police Officer
desc:
Post 31
***Radio** (Passive)*
Access a factional chat with other Police-subaligned players.
***Search***
Target a player. You will learn if they commit a crime (an attack, score- or response-affecting ability) tonight.
***Arrest*** (0x, charge 60%)*
Target a player. They will automatically attack you. If you survive, they will be roleblocked this and the next 2 nights.
***Lethal Force** (0x, charge 120%)*
Attack a player. If they are not town, they will automatically counterattack you.
***Administrative Leave** (Passive)*
After you use Search and receive no information, or Arrest or Lethal Force on anyone, the Search, Arrest and Lethal Force abilities become Locked.
***Bureaucratic Oversight** (Attributive)*
You must spawn with a Chief of Police.
